fr.escape.resources.scenario

Class ScenarioConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.escape.resources.scenario.ScenarioConfiguration

  • final class ScenarioConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object

    An object which represent a Scenario Configuration in ScenarioFactory.
